header: The Message to the Church in Sardis

verse: “Write this letter to the angel of the church in Sardis. This is the message from the one who has the sevenfold Spirit of God and the seven stars:

header: The Message to the Church in Philadelphia

verse: “Write this letter to the angel of the church in Philadelphia.

header: The Message to the Church in Laodicea

verse: “Write this letter to the angel of the church in Laodicea. This is the message from the one who is the Amen—the faithful and true witness, the beginning of God’s new creation:
